DOC.brief_summary: Genkyst is a regional cohort involving up to nephrologists working in private and public nephrology centers in the West of France. It registers clinical and molecular genetic data of all consenting patients with ADPKD from this area.
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of Clinical and Molecular Genetic Data Influencing the Evolution and Response to Therapy of ADPKD Patients (Autosomal Dominant Polycystic Kidney Disease)
DOC.criteria: ADPKD patients followed in Nephrology centers in the West of France Age >17
